dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notification of Infringement - Primerica ref# 12.04.1.4
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 08, 2005 11:18 AM
To: christine.lesiak@pfsfhq.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Notification of Infringement - Primerica ref#
12.04.1.4

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Christine Lesiak <christine.lesiak@pfsfhq.com>
To: webmaster@augustachamber.org, support@baremetal.com,
abuse@theplanet.com, admins@theplanet.com
Date: Tuesday, February 8, 2005, 10:23:03 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Notification of Infringement - Primerica ref# 12.04.1.4

===8<==============Original message text===============
NOTIFICATION OF INFRINGEMENT


Dear Webmaster,

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the intellectual property
rights. I have a good faith belief that the owner, its agents or the law
has not authorized the use of the material identified below. Please promptly
remove the infringing material and disable access to it.

Name of the Intellectual Property Owner:  Primerica Financial Services,Inc.

Name and/or Description of the Infringed Work or Right: Trademark Primerica

Description of the Infringing Material: Unapproved Advertising

Location of the Infringing Material:
http://www.augustachamber.org/member_information_106.html

Date: February 8, 2005

I can be contacted at:

Name: Christine Lesiak

Title: Compliance Specialist, Office of the General Counsel

Company or Organization: Primerica Financial Services, Inc.

Street: 3120 Breckinridge Boulevard

City: Duluth

State: GA

Zip: 30099-0001

Telephone:  770.564.6107  Fax: 770.279.2752

Email: christine.lesiak@pfsfhq.com

I certify under penalty of perjury the truth of the above information.
Signature:

Christine Lesiak

P. S. Ms. Cash has sent us several emails indicating her request to the
chamber to correct or remove this ad and there has been no change. Please
remove it from the internet.









===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCCPRevK/XpJs6oyURApNLAJ0axjEv8/UFSwKx3BUd8SaF7gxG3QCfVbtx
RE1W4U6xxT1tua3/AsPH1LM=
=bKvd
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
